page.title: 08Shipbourne Village today.1
page.content: Shipbourne is in Kent.It is a quiet village with a population of 500.In the village is a farm that belongs to Fairlawn Estate.There are no shops in Shipbourne so the people have to shop outside the village.As there is a poor bus service people need cars.Lots of the people live in converted buildings most of the buildings are quite old but there are some modern ones.Not many people work in the village they commute to places like Tonbridge and London.Shipbourne is a dormatory village,people come here for peace and quiet. St Giles Church. In the 15th century there was a chapel at Shipbourne which belonged to the Knights Hospitallers.A new church, desigined by J.Gibbs, was built in 1722,this was replaced in 1881 by our present church.
